<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>EPL Transfer Hub - Latest Premier League Transfers | EPL News Hub</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Track all the latest Premier League transfers, rumors, and confirmed deals. Get real-time updates on player movements across all EPL clubs.">
    
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css">
    <link rel="icon" type="image/png" href="favicon.png">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.0.0-beta3/css/all.min.css">
    
    <style>
        .transfer-hub-hero {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4a2c7a 0%, #6b4c9a 50%, #8e6bb3 100%);
            padding: 80px 20px 40px;
            text-align: center;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .transfer-hub-hero::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: -50%;
            left: -50%;
            width: 200%;
            height: 200%;
            background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(255,255,255,0.05) 1px, transparent 1px);
            background-size: 50px 50px;
            animation: moveGrid 20s linear infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes moveGrid {
            0% { transform: translate(0, 0); }
            100% { transform: translate(50px, 50px); }
        }
        
        .hero-content {
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1;
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }
        
        .hero-title {
            font-size: 3.5em;
            font-weight: bold;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e, #ffd700);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            text-shadow: 0 0 30px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.5);
            animation: glow 2s ease-in-out infinite alternate;
        }
        
        @keyframes glow {
            from { filter: brightness(1); }
            to { filter: brightness(1.2); }
        }
        
        .hero-subtitle {
            font-size: 1.2em;
            color: #ffffff;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            font-weight: 500;
        }
        
        .transfer-stats {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 40px;
            margin-top: 30px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }
        
        .stat-card {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
            padding: 20px 30px;
            border-radius: 15px;
            transition: transform 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .stat-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
        }
        
        .stat-number {
            font-size: 2.5em;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #ffd700;
            display: block;
        }
        
        .stat-card .stat-label {
            font-size: 0.9em;
            color: #ffffff !important;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 1px;
            opacity: 0.9;
            display: block;
            margin-top: 5px;
        }
        
        .transfer-controls {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 40px auto 20px;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }
        
        .search-filter-container {
            display: flex;
            gap: 20px;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }
        
        /* Search box styles removed - cleaner interface */
        
        .filter-buttons {
            display: flex;
            gap: 10px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }
        
        .filter-btn {
            padding: 12px 25px;
            border: 2px solid #8e6bb3;
            background: #ffffff;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            border-radius: 50px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            font-weight: 600;
        }
        
        .filter-btn:hover {
            background: #8e6bb3;
            color: white;
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }
        
        .filter-btn.active {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            color: #4a2c7a;
            border-color: #ffd700;
        }
        
        .transfer-categories {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 20px;
            margin-bottom: 40px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }
        
        .category-tab {
            padding: 15px 35px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #6b4c9a, #8e6bb3);
            border: 2px solid #ffd700;
            border-radius: 50px;
            color: white;
            font-weight: bold;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .category-tab::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: -100%;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3), transparent);
            transition: left 0.5s ease;
        }
        
        .category-tab:hover::before {
            left: 100%;
        }
        
        .category-tab.active {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            color: #4a2c7a;
            transform: scale(1.05);
        }
        
        .transfers-container {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: 0 20px;
            background: #f8f9fa;
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 30px;
        }
        
        .transfer-section {
            display: none;
            animation: fadeIn 0.5s ease;
        }
        
        .transfer-section.active {
            display: block;
        }
        
        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); }
            to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
        }

        /* Enhanced animations for new transfer cards */
        .transfer-card-new {
            animation: slideInUp 0.6s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1) forwards;
        }

        @keyframes slideInUp {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(30px) scale(0.95);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0) scale(1);
            }
        }

        /* Pulse animation for live badge */
        @keyframes pulse {
            0% { transform: scale(1); }
            50% { transform: scale(1.05); }
            100% { transform: scale(1); }
        }

        @keyframes urgentPulse {
            0% { 
                transform: scale(1); 
                box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.3);
            }
            50% { 
                transform: scale(1.08); 
                box-shadow: 0 8px 30px rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.6);
            }
            100% { 
                transform: scale(1); 
                box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.3);
            }
        }

        /* Enhanced hover states for better polish */
        .transfer-fee:hover {
            transform: scale(1.05);
            transition: transform 0.3s ease;
        }

        .player-name:hover {
            color: #ffd700;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: color 0.3s ease;
        }


        @keyframes loadingGradient {
            0% { background-position: 200% 0; }
            100% { background-position: -200% 0; }
        }





        .player-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            padding-bottom: 15px;
            border-bottom: 2px solid #e9ecef;
        }

        .player-header h3 {
            margin: 0;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            font-size: 1.3em;
        }

        .position-badge {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            color: #4a2c7a;
            padding: 5px 12px;
            border-radius: 15px;
            font-size: 0.8em;
            font-weight: 600;
        }

        .detail-row {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 10px 0;
            border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
        }

        .detail-row.highlight {
            background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.1);
            margin: 0 -15px;
            padding: 12px 15px;
            border-radius: 10px;
            border-bottom: none;
        }

        .detail-row .label {
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #6c757d;
            font-size: 0.9em;
        }

        .detail-row .value {
            font-weight: 500;
            color: #333;
        }

        .detail-row .value.fee {
            color: #ffd700;
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 1.1em;
        }

        .performance-indicators {
            margin-top: 20px;
            padding-top: 20px;
            border-top: 2px solid #e9ecef;
        }

        .indicator {
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }

        .indicator-label {
            display: block;
            font-size: 0.9em;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
        }

        .indicator-bar {
            background: #e9ecef;
            height: 8px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            overflow: hidden;
            position: relative;
        }

        .indicator-fill {
            height: 100%;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: width 1.5s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
        }

        .indicator-value {
            position: absolute;
            right: 0;
            top: -20px;
            font-size: 0.8em;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #ffd700;
        }

        .comparison-vs.enhanced {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff, #f8f9fa);
            border: 2px solid #ffd700;
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 25px;
            box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.2);
            min-height: 300px;
        }

        .vs-container {
            text-align: center;
        }

        .vs-icon {
            font-size: 3em;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }

        .vs-verdict h4 {
            margin: 0 0 10px 0;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            font-size: 1.2em;
        }

        .vs-verdict p {
            margin: 0 0 20px 0;
            color: #6c757d;
            font-size: 0.9em;
            line-height: 1.4;
        }

        .comparison-stats {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 10px;
            width: 100%;
        }

        .stat {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            padding: 8px 12px;
            background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.1);
            border-radius: 8px;
        }

        .stat-label {
            font-size: 0.8em;
            color: #6c757d;
            font-weight: 600;
        }

        .stat-value {
            font-size: 0.8em;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            font-weight: bold;
        }

        .comparison-charts {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(400px, 1fr));
            gap: 30px;
            margin-top: 30px;
        }

        .chart-container {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff, #f8f9fa);
            border: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 25px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
        }

        .chart-container h4 {
            margin: 0 0 20px 0;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            font-size: 1.1em;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .chart-container canvas {
            width: 100%;
            height: auto;
        }


        /* Advanced Filters Panel */
        .advanced-filters-panel {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            right: -400px;
            width: 400px;
            height: 100vh;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff, #f8f9fa);
            box-shadow: -5px 0 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            z-index: 1003;
            transition: right 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
            overflow-y: auto;
        }

        .advanced-filters-panel.active {
            right: 0;
        }

        .filters-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 20px;
            border-bottom: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4a2c7a, #6b4c9a);
            color: white;
        }

        .filters-header h3 {
            margin: 0;
            font-size: 1.3em;
        }

        .close-filters {
            background: none;
            border: none;
            color: white;
            font-size: 1.5em;
            cursor: pointer;
            padding: 5px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            transition: background 0.3s ease;
        }

        .close-filters:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
        }

        .filters-grid {
            padding: 20px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 25px;
        }

        .filter-group label {
            display: block;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #4a2c7a;
        }

        .range-slider {
            position: relative;
            margin: 15px 0;
        }

        .range-slider input[type="range"] {
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 5px;
            background: none;
            pointer-events: none;
            -webkit-appearance: none;
        }

        .range-slider input[type="range"]::-webkit-slider-thumb {
            height: 20px;
            width: 20px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: #ffd700;
            cursor: pointer;
            border: 3px solid white;
            box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            pointer-events: auto;
            -webkit-appearance: none;
        }

        .range-values {
            text-align: center;
            margin-top: 20px;
            color: #6c757d;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        .age-range {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
        }

        .age-range input {
            padding: 8px 12px;
            border: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            border-radius: 10px;
            width: 80px;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .checkbox-group {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 10px;
        }

        .checkbox-group label {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
            font-weight: normal;
            cursor: pointer;
        }

        .filters-actions {
            padding: 20px;
            border-top: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            display: flex;
            gap: 15px;
        }

        .apply-filters-btn,
        .reset-filters-btn {
            flex: 1;
            padding: 12px;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 25px;
            font-weight: 600;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .apply-filters-btn {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            color: #4a2c7a;
        }

        .reset-filters-btn {
            background: #6c757d;
            color: white;
        }

        .apply-filters-btn:hover,
        .reset-filters-btn:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
        }

        /* Transfer Insights */
        .transfer-insights-section {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 40px auto;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }

        .insights-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 20px;
        }

        .insights-title {
            font-size: 2em;
            color: #ffd700;
        }

        .toggle-advanced-filters {
            padding: 12px 20px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4a2c7a, #6b4c9a);
            color: white;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 25px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-weight: 600;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
        }

        .toggle-advanced-filters:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(74, 44, 122, 0.3);
        }

        .insights-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(280px, 1fr));
            gap: 25px;
        }

        .insight-card {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff, #f8f9fa);
            border: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 25px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 20px;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
        }

        .insight-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.2);
        }

        .insight-icon {
            font-size: 2.5em;
            width: 60px;
            height: 60px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            border-radius: 50%;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }

        .insight-content h4 {
            margin: 0 0 8px 0;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            font-size: 1.1em;
        }

        .insight-content p {
            margin: 0 0 8px 0;
            color: #6c757d;
            font-size: 0.9em;
            line-height: 1.4;
        }

        .insight-trend {
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 0.9em;
        }

        .insight-trend.positive {
            color: #28a745;
        }

        .insight-detail {
            background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.2);
            color: #4a2c7a;
            padding: 4px 10px;
            border-radius: 12px;
            font-size: 0.8em;
            font-weight: 600;
            display: inline-block;
        }

        /* Watchlist Section */
        .watchlist-section {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 40px auto;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }

        .watchlist-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 20px;
        }

        .watchlist-title {
            font-size: 2em;
            color: #ffd700;
        }

        .watchlist-controls {
            display: flex;
            gap: 15px;
            align-items: center;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }

        .add-to-watchlist-btn {
            padding: 12px 20px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #28a745, #34ce57);
            color: white;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 25px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-weight: 600;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
        }

        .add-to-watchlist-btn:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(40, 167, 69, 0.3);
        }

        .watchlist-sort select {
            padding: 10px 15px;
            border: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            border-radius: 20px;
            background: white;
            color: #333;
            cursor: pointer;
        }

        .watchlist-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(300px, 1fr));
            gap: 25px;
        }

        .empty-watchlist {
            grid-column: 1 / -1;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 60px 20px;
            color: #6c757d;
        }

        .empty-watchlist i {
            font-size: 4em;
            color: #8e6bb3;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }

        /* Alerts Section */
        .alerts-section {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 40px auto;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }

        .alerts-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 20px;
        }

        .alerts-title {
            font-size: 2em;
            color: #ffd700;
        }

        .setup-alerts-btn {
            padding: 12px 20px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b6b, #ff8787);
            color: white;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 25px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-weight: 600;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .setup-alerts-btn:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(255, 107, 107, 0.3);
        }

        .alerts-preview {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
            gap: 25px;
        }

        .alert-example {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff, #f8f9fa);
            border: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            border-radius: 15px;
            padding: 20px;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
        }

        .alert-example:hover {
            transform: translateY(-3px);
            box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
        }

        .alert-type {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            font-weight: 600;
        }

        .alert-content {
            color: #6c757d;
            line-height: 1.4;
        }

        /* Mobile Optimizations */
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .advanced-filters-panel {
                width: 100%;
                right: -100%;
            }

            .comparison-selects {
                flex-direction: column;
                width: 100%;
            }

            .comparison-select {
                width: 100%;
                min-width: auto;
            }

            .vs-indicator {
                order: -1;
            }

            .timeline-line {
                left: 20px;
            }

            .timeline-event-content {
                width: calc(100% - 60px);
                margin-left: 60px;
            }

            .timeline-event:nth-child(even) .timeline-event-content {
                margin-left: 60px;
            }

            .timeline-event-dot {
                left: 20px;
            }

            .insights-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }

            .insight-card {
                flex-direction: column;
                text-align: center;
            }
        }
        
        .transfers-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: 25px;
            margin-bottom: 40px;
        }

        /* Tablet responsive - 2 columns on medium screens */
        @media (max-width: 1024px) and (min-width: 769px) {
            .transfers-grid {
                grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
                gap: 20px;
            }
        }
        
        .transfer-card {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff 0%, #f8f9fa 100%);
            border: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 25px;
            transition: all 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
        }
        
        .transfer-card::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: -2px;
            left: -2px;
            right: -2px;
            bottom: -2px;
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            border-radius: 20px;
            opacity: 0;
            z-index: -1;
            transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
            background-size: 400% 400%;
            animation: gradientShift 3s ease infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes gradientShift {
            0% { background-position: 0% 50%; }
            50% { background-position: 100% 50%; }
            100% { background-position: 0% 50%; }
        }
        
        .transfer-card:hover::before {
            opacity: 1;
        }
        
        .transfer-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-8px) scale(1.02);
            box-shadow: 0 15px 40px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.25);
        }
        
        .transfer-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: start;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        
        .transfer-clubs {
            flex: 1;
            color: #333333;
            font-weight: 600;
        }
        
        .club-badge {
            width: 40px;
            height: 40px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            margin-right: 10px;
        }
        
        .transfer-arrow {
            color: #ffd700;
            margin: 0 15px;
            font-size: 1.2em;
        }
        
        .transfer-fee {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            color: #4a2c7a;
            padding: 5px 15px;
            border-radius: 20px;
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 0.9em;
        }
        
        .player-info {
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }
        
        .player-name {
            font-size: 1.3em;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
        }
        
        .player-position {
            color: #6c757d;
            font-size: 0.9em;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 1px;
        }
        
        .transfer-details {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            padding-top: 15px;
            border-top: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
        }
        
        .transfer-date {
            color: #6c757d;
            font-size: 0.9em;
        }
        
        .transfer-status {
            padding: 5px 12px;
            border-radius: 15px;
            font-size: 0.85em;
            font-weight: 600;
            text-transform: uppercase;
        }
        
        .status-confirmed {
            background: rgba(76, 175, 80, 0.2);
            color: #4caf50;
            border: 1px solid #4caf50;
        }
        
        .status-rumor {
            background: rgba(255, 152, 0, 0.2);
            color: #ff9800;
            border: 1px solid #ff9800;
        }
        
        .status-medical {
            background: rgba(33, 150, 243, 0.2);
            color: #2196f3;
            border: 1px solid #2196f3;
        }
        
        
        .no-results {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 60px 20px;
            color: #6c757d;
        }
        
        .no-results i {
            font-size: 4em;
            color: #8e6bb3;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        
        /* Transfer Countdown Timer */
        .transfer-countdown-section {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b6b, #ff8787);
            padding: 30px 20px;
            margin: 30px 0;
        }
        
        .countdown-container {
            max-width: 800px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            text-align: center;
        }
        
        .countdown-title {
            color: white;
            font-size: 1.5em;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 2px;
        }
        
        .countdown-timer {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 30px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }
        
        .time-unit {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
            padding: 20px;
            border-radius: 15px;
            min-width: 100px;
            box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            transition: transform 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .time-unit:hover {
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        
        .time-value {
            display: block;
            font-size: 3em;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #ff6b6b;
            line-height: 1;
        }
        
        .time-label {
            display: block;
            font-size: 0.9em;
            color: #666;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            margin-top: 10px;
            letter-spacing: 1px;
        }
        
        /* Enhanced Live Transfer Ticker */
        .transfer-ticker-section {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0a0a0f 0%, #1a1a2e 100%);
            padding: 18px 0;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            border-top: 2px solid #ffd700;
            border-bottom: 2px solid #ffd700;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
        }
        
        .transfer-ticker-section::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: -100%;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.15), transparent);
            animation: shimmer 8s infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes shimmer {
            0% { left: -100%; }
            100% { left: 100%; }
        }
        
        .ticker-header {
            position: absolute;
            left: 30px;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            z-index: 10;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 15px;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #0a0a0f 0%, rgba(10, 10, 15, 0.8) 85%, transparent 100%);
            padding-right: 40px;
        }
        
        .ticker-badge {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff0000, #ff3333);
            color: white;
            padding: 8px 14px;
            border-radius: 20px;
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 0.85em;
            animation: pulse 1.5s ease-in-out infinite;
            box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.6);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 6px;
            letter-spacing: 0.5px;
        }
        
        .ticker-badge::before {
            content: '';
            width: 8px;
            height: 8px;
            background: white;
            border-radius: 50%;
            animation: blink 1s ease-in-out infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes blink {
            0%, 100% { opacity: 1; }
            50% { opacity: 0.3; }
        }
        
        .ticker-title {
            color: #ffd700;
            font-weight: 700;
            font-size: 1.05em;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 1.2px;
            text-shadow: 0 0 12px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.6);
        }
        
        .ticker-wrapper {
            overflow: hidden;
            padding-left: 300px;
        }
        
        .ticker-content {
            display: flex;
            animation: scroll 45s linear infinite;
            white-space: nowrap;
        }
        
        .ticker-item {
            color: #ffffff;
            padding: 0 70px;
            font-size: 1.05em;
            font-weight: 500;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .ticker-item:hover {
            color: #ffd700;
            text-shadow: 0 0 8px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.5);
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }
        
        @keyframes scroll {
            0% { transform: translateX(0); }
            100% { transform: translateX(-50%); }
        }
        
        /* Advanced Filters */
        .advanced-filters {
            display: flex;
            gap: 15px;
            margin-top: 20px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            align-items: center;
        }
        
        .filter-select {
            padding: 12px 20px;
            border: 2px solid #8e6bb3;
            background: #ffffff;
            color: #333333;
            border-radius: 50px;
            font-size: 1em;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            min-width: 150px;
        }
        
        .filter-select:hover {
            background: #8e6bb3;
            color: white;
            border-color: #ffd700;
        }
        
        .filter-select:focus {
            outline: none;
            box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3);
        }
        
        .reset-filters-btn {
            padding: 12px 25px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b6b, #ff8787);
            color: white;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 50px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-weight: 600;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
        }
        
        .reset-filters-btn:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(255, 107, 107, 0.4);
        }
        
        /* Club View Toggle */
        .view-toggle {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 10px;
            margin: 20px 0;
        }
        
        .view-btn {
            padding: 10px 20px;
            background: #6b4c9a;
            color: white;
            border: 2px solid #ffd700;
            border-radius: 25px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .view-btn.active {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            color: #4a2c7a;
        }
        
        /* Transfer Analytics Section */
        .transfer-analytics {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 40px auto;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }
        
        .analytics-header {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }
        
        .analytics-title {
            font-size: 2em;
            color: #ffd700;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }
        
        .analytics-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
            gap: 25px;
        }
        
        .analytics-card {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #6b4c9a, #8e6bb3);
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 25px;
            border: 2px solid rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3);
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }
        
        .analytics-card h4 {
            color: #ffd700;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
            font-size: 1.2em;
        }
        
        .club-spending-list {
            list-style: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        
        .club-spending-item {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            padding: 10px 0;
            border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            color: white;
        }
        
        .spending-bar {
            height: 8px;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            border-radius: 4px;
            margin-top: 5px;
            transition: width 1s ease;
        }
        
        /* Transfer Probability Tracker */
        .transfer-probability-section {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 40px auto;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }
        
        .probability-header {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }
        
        .probability-title {
            font-size: 2em;
            color: #ffd700;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
        }
        
        .probability-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: 25px;
            margin-bottom: 40px;
        }
        
        .probability-card {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff, #f8f9fa);
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 25px;
            border: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            box-shadow: 0 5px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
            transition: all 0.4s ease;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .probability-card::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            height: 4px;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #4caf50, #8bc34a, #ffc107, #ff9800, #f44336);
            background-size: 200% 100%;
            animation: probabilityGradient 3s linear infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes probabilityGradient {
            0% { background-position: 200% 0; }
            100% { background-position: -200% 0; }
        }
        
        .probability-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-8px) scale(1.02);
            box-shadow: 0 15px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.15);
        }
        
        .probability-header-info {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        
        .probability-clubs {
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #333;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
        }
        
        .probability-percentage {
            font-size: 1.8em;
            font-weight: 900;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4caf50, #66bb6a);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
        }
        
        .probability-bar-container {
            background: #e9ecef;
            height: 12px;
            border-radius: 6px;
            overflow: hidden;
            margin: 15px 0;
            position: relative;
        }
        
        .probability-bar {
            height: 100%;
            border-radius: 6px;
            transition: width 1.5s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .probability-bar::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.3), transparent);
            animation: shimmer 2s infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes shimmer {
            0% { transform: translateX(-100%); }
            100% { transform: translateX(100%); }
        }
        
        /* FPL Promotional Banner Styles */
        .fpl-promo-banner {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #37003c 0%, #00ff87 100%);
            padding: 25px 20px;
            margin: 20px 0;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(55, 0, 60, 0.3);
        }
        
        .fpl-promo-banner::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: -50%;
            left: -50%;
            width: 200%;
            height: 200%;
            background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 1px, transparent 1px);
            background-size: 30px 30px;
            animation: moveGrid 15s linear infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes moveGrid {
            0% { transform: translate(0, 0); }
            100% { transform: translate(30px, 30px); }
        }
        
        .promo-container {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1;
        }
        
        .promo-content {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 40px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }
        
        .promo-left {
            flex: 1;
            min-width: 300px;
        }
        
        .promo-title {
            font-size: 2.2em;
            color: white;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            font-weight: bold;
            text-shadow: 0 2px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
        }
        
        .promo-badge {
            background: #ff0000;
            color: white;
            padding: 4px 12px;
            border-radius: 20px;
            font-size: 0.5em;
            font-weight: bold;
            display: inline-block;
            margin-right: 10px;
            animation: pulse 1.5s ease-in-out infinite;
            vertical-align: middle;
        }
        
        .promo-subtitle {
            color: #00ff87;
            font-size: 1.1em;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            font-weight: 500;
        }
        
        .promo-countdown {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 15px;
        }
        
        .countdown-label {
            color: white;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 1em;
        }
        
        .countdown-boxes {
            display: flex;
            gap: 10px;
        }
        
        .countdown-box {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 8px 12px;
            text-align: center;
            min-width: 60px;
        }
        
        .countdown-number {
            display: block;
            font-size: 1.5em;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #00ff87;
            text-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 255, 135, 0.5);
        }
        
        .countdown-unit {
            display: block;
            font-size: 0.75em;
            color: white;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 1px;
            margin-top: 2px;
        }
        
        .promo-right {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 20px;
            align-items: flex-end;
        }
        
        .promo-tools {
            display: flex;
            gap: 15px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }
        
        .promo-tool-link {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
            padding: 10px 15px;
            border-radius: 25px;
            color: white;
            text-decoration: none;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 0.95em;
        }
        
        .promo-tool-link:hover {
            background: rgba(0, 255, 135, 0.2);
            border-color: #00ff87;
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0, 255, 135, 0.3);
        }
        
        .promo-tool-link i {
            color: #00ff87;
        }
        
        .promo-cta-btn {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #00ff87, #00cc6f);
            color: #37003c;
            padding: 15px 30px;
            border-radius: 30px;
            text-decoration: none;
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 1.1em;
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0, 255, 135, 0.4);
        }
        
        .promo-cta-btn:hover {
            transform: translateY(-3px);
            box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(0, 255, 135, 0.6);
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #00ff87, #00ff87);
        }
        
        .promo-close {
            position: absolute;
            top: 15px;
            right: 15px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            border: none;
            color: white;
            width: 30px;
            height: 30px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            cursor: pointer;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            z-index: 10;
        }
        
        .promo-close:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
            transform: rotate(90deg);
        }
        
        .fpl-promo-banner.hidden {
            display: none;
        }
        
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .promo-content {
                flex-direction: column;
                text-align: center;
            }
            
            .promo-title {
                font-size: 1.6em;
            }
            
            .promo-right {
                align-items: center;
                width: 100%;
            }
            
            .promo-tools {
                justify-content: center;
            }
            
            .countdown-boxes {
                justify-content: center;
            }
            
            .promo-countdown {
                flex-direction: column;
            }
        }
        
        .probability-high { background: linear-gradient(90deg, #4caf50, #66bb6a); }
        .probability-medium { background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ffc107, #ffeb3b); }
        .probability-low { background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ff9800, #ffb74d); }
        .probability-unlikely { background: linear-gradient(90deg, #f44336, #ef5350); }
        
        .probability-factors {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 8px;
            margin-top: 15px;
        }
        
        .factor-tag {
            background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.1);
            color: #4a2c7a;
            padding: 4px 10px;
            border-radius: 12px;
            font-size: 0.8em;
            font-weight: 500;
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3);
        }
        
        /* Social Sharing Section */
        .social-sharing {
            position: fixed;
            right: 20px;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            z-index: 1000;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 15px;
        }
        
        .share-btn {
            width: 50px;
            height: 50px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            color: white;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .share-btn::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.2), transparent);
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .share-btn:hover::before {
            opacity: 1;
            animation: shine 0.6s ease;
        }
        
        @keyframes shine {
            0% { transform: translateX(-100%) rotate(45deg); }
            100% { transform: translateX(100%) rotate(45deg); }
        }
        
        .share-twitter { background: #1da1f2; }
        .share-facebook { background: #4267b2; }
        .share-linkedin { background: #0077b5; }
        .share-whatsapp { background: #25d366; }
        .share-copy { background: #6c757d; }
        
        .share-btn:hover {
            transform: scale(1.1);
            box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
        }
        
        /* Enhanced Transfer Cards with Interactive Elements */
        .transfer-card-enhanced {
            position: relative;
            cursor: pointer;
        }
        
        .transfer-card-enhanced .quick-actions {
            position: absolute;
            top: 15px;
            right: 15px;
            display: flex;
            gap: 8px;
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .transfer-card-enhanced:hover .quick-actions {
            opacity: 1;
        }
        
        .quick-action-btn {
            width: 30px;
            height: 30px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
            border: none;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            color: #4a2c7a;
        }
        
        .quick-action-btn:hover {
            background: #ffd700;
            transform: scale(1.1);
        }
        
        /* Transfer News Feed */
        .transfer-news-section {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 40px auto;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }
        
        .news-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 25px;
        }
        
        .news-title {
            font-size: 1.8em;
            color: #ffd700;
            font-weight: bold;
        }
        
        /* Live Updates Badge */
        .live-updates-badge {
            position: fixed;
            top: 20px;
            right: 20px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b6b, #ff8787);
            color: white;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            border-radius: 25px;
            font-weight: 600;
            z-index: 1001;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(255, 107, 107, 0.3);
            animation: pulse 2s infinite;
        }
        
        .live-updates-badge::before {
            content: 'üî¥';
            margin-right: 8px;
        }
        
        /* Interactive Filter Chips */
        .filter-chips {
            display: flex;
            gap: 10px;
            margin: 20px 0;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }
        
        .filter-chip {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
            border: 2px solid #8e6bb3;
            color: #4a2c7a;
            padding: 8px 16px;
            border-radius: 20px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            font-weight: 500;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .filter-chip::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: -100%;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3), transparent);
            transition: left 0.5s ease;
        }
        
        .filter-chip:hover::before {
            left: 100%;
        }
        
        .filter-chip.active {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffd700, #ffed4e);
            border-color: #ffd700;
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3);
        }
        
        .filter-chip .chip-count {
            background: rgba(74, 44, 122, 0.1);
            color: #4a2c7a;
            padding: 2px 8px;
            border-radius: 10px;
            font-size: 0.8em;
            margin-left: 8px;
        }
        
        /* Enhanced Analytics with Charts */
        .analytics-chart-container {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #6b4c9a, #8e6bb3);
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 25px;
            margin: 20px 0;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .analytics-chart-container::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: -50%;
            left: -50%;
            width: 200%;
            height: 200%;
            background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(255,255,255,0.03) 1px, transparent 1px);
            background-size: 20px 20px;
            animation: movePattern 15s linear infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes movePattern {
            0% { transform: translate(0, 0) rotate(0deg); }
            100% { transform: translate(20px, 20px) rotate(360deg); }
        }
        
        .chart-placeholder {
            height: 200px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 10px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            color: #ffd700;
            font-size: 1.2em;
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1;
        }
        
        /* Notification System */
        .notification-container {
            position: fixed;
            top: 20px;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            z-index: 1002;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
        
        .notification {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4caf50, #66bb6a);
            color: white;
            padding: 15px 25px;
            border-radius: 25px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;

<body>
    <!-- Include Header -->
    <div include="./header.html"></div>

    <!-- Live Updates Badge -->
    <div class="live-updates-badge">
        Live Updates
    </div>

    <!-- Social Sharing -->
    <div class="social-sharing">
        <a href="#" class="share-btn share-twitter" onclick="shareOnTwitter()" title="Share on Twitter">
            <i class="fab fa-twitter"></i>
        </a>
        <a href="#" class="share-btn share-facebook" onclick="shareOnFacebook()" title="Share on Facebook">
            <i class="fab fa-facebook-f"></i>
        </a>
        <a href="#" class="share-btn share-linkedin" onclick="shareOnLinkedIn()" title="Share on LinkedIn">
            <i class="fab fa-linkedin-in"></i>
        </a>
        <a href="#" class="share-btn share-whatsapp" onclick="shareOnWhatsApp()" title="Share on WhatsApp">
            <i class="fab fa-whatsapp"></i>
        </a>
        <a href="#" class="share-btn share-copy" onclick="copyToClipboard()" title="Copy Link">
            <i class="fas fa-link"></i>
        </a>
    </div>

    <!-- Notification Container -->
    <div class="notification-container" id="notification-container"></div>

    <div class="transfer-hub-hero">
        <div class="hero-content">
            <h1 class="hero-title">EPL Transfer Hub</h1>
            <p class="hero-subtitle">Track every move in the Premier League transfer market</p>
            <div class="transfer-stats">
                <div class="stat-card">
                    <span class="stat-number">53</span>
                    <span class="stat-label">Total Transfers</span>
                </div>
                <div class="stat-card">
                    <span class="stat-number">¬£2.1B</span>
                    <span class="stat-label">Total Spent</span>
                </div>
                <div class="stat-card">
                    <span class="stat-number">20</span>
                    <span class="stat-label">Confirmed Deals</span>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Transfer Window Countdown Timer -->
    <div class="transfer-countdown-section">
        <div class="countdown-container">
            <h3 class="countdown-title">‚è∞ Transfer Window Closes In:</h3>
            <div class="countdown-timer" id="countdown-timer">
                <div class="time-unit">
                    <span class="time-value" id="days">00</span>
                    <span class="time-label">Days</span>
                </div>
                <div class="time-unit">
                    <span class="time-value" id="hours">00</span>
                    <span class="time-label">Hours</span>
                </div>
                <div class="time-unit">
                    <span class="time-value" id="minutes">00</span>
                    <span class="time-label">Minutes</span>
                </div>
                <div class="time-unit">
                    <span class="time-value" id="seconds">00</span>
                    <span class="time-label">Seconds</span>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
    // Inline countdown script - runs immediately after HTML elements are created
    (function() {
        console.log('Inline countdown script starting...');
        
        function updateCountdownNow() {
            // September 1, 2025 at 7:00 PM
            const deadline = new Date('2025-09-01T19:00:00').getTime();
            const now = Date.now();
            const timeLeft = deadline - now;
            
            if (timeLeft <= 0) {
                document.getElementById('days').innerHTML = '00';
                document.getElementById('hours').innerHTML = '00';
                document.getElementById('minutes').innerHTML = '00';
                document.getElementById('seconds').innerHTML = '00';
                console.log('Transfer window closed');
                return;
            }
            
            const days = Math.floor(timeLeft / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));
            const hours = Math.floor((timeLeft % (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)) / (1000 * 60 * 60));
            const minutes = Math.floor((timeLeft % (1000 * 60 * 60)) / (1000 * 60));
            const seconds = Math.floor((timeLeft % (1000 * 60)) / 1000);
            
            // Force update using innerHTML
            const daysEl = document.getElementById('days');
            const hoursEl = document.getElementById('hours');
            const minutesEl = document.getElementById('minutes');
            const secondsEl = document.getElementById('seconds');
            
            if (daysEl) daysEl.innerHTML = String(days).padStart(2, '0');
            if (hoursEl) hoursEl.innerHTML = String(hours).padStart(2, '0');
            if (minutesEl) minutesEl.innerHTML = String(minutes).padStart(2, '0');
            if (secondsEl) secondsEl.innerHTML = String(seconds).padStart(2, '0');
            
            console.log(`Inline countdown: ${days}d ${hours}h ${minutes}m ${seconds}s`);
        }
        
        // Start immediately
        updateCountdownNow();
        
        // Update every second
        window.countdownInterval = setInterval(updateCountdownNow, 1000);
        
        console.log('Inline countdown started successfully');
    })();
    
    // Function to show transfer window closed message
    function showTransferWindowClosed() {
        const countdownSection = document.querySelector('.transfer-countdown-section');
        if (countdownSection) {
            const closedMessage = document.createElement('div');
            closedMessage.className = 'window-closed-message';
            closedMessage.style.cssText = `
                padding: 20px;
                background: linear-gradient(135deg, #dc3545, #c82333);
                color: white;
                border-radius: 10px;
                margin: 20px auto;
                text-align: center;
                font-size: 1.1em;
                font-weight: bold;
                max-width: 600px;
                animation: fadeIn 0.5s ease;
            `;
            closedMessage.innerHTML = `
                <i class="fas fa-lock" style="font-size: 2em; margin-bottom: 10px; display: block;"></i>
                <h3 style="margin: 10px 0;">Transfer Window Closed</h3>
                <p style="margin: 10px 0; opacity: 0.9;">The summer transfer window has officially closed. Check back for winter window updates!</p>
            `;
            
            countdownSection.innerHTML = '';
            countdownSection.appendChild(closedMessage);
        }
        
        // Show notification if function exists
        if (typeof showNotification === 'function') {
            setTimeout(() => {
                showNotification('Transfer window is now closed!', 'info');
            }, 1000);
        }
    }
    </script>

    <!-- FPL Tools Promotional Banner -->

                    </h2>

                    <div class="promo-countdown">
                        <span class="countdown-label">Offer ends in:</span>
                        <div class="countdown-boxes">
                            <div class="countdown-box">
                                <span class="countdown-number" id="promo-days">00</span>
                                <span class="countdown-unit">Days</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="countdown-box">
                                <span class="countdown-number" id="promo-hours">00</span>
                                <span class="countdown-unit">Hours</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="countdown-box">
                                <span class="countdown-number" id="promo-minutes">00</span>
                                <span class="countdown-unit">Minutes</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="countdown-box">
                                <span class="countdown-number" id="promo-seconds">00</span>
                                <span class="countdown-unit">Seconds</span>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="promo-right">
                    <div class="promo-tools">
                        <a href="/fpl-ai-assistant.html" class="promo-tool-link">
                            <i class="fas fa-robot"></i>

    <div class="seo-content-wrapper">
        <!-- Understanding the Premier League Transfer Window Section -->
        <section class="seo-content-section" id="transfer-window-guide">
            <div class="content-container">
                <h2 class="section-title">Understanding the Premier League Transfer Window</h2>
                <div class="content-grid">
                    <div class="main-content">
                        <p class="lead-paragraph">The Premier League transfer window is one of the most exciting periods in football, where clubs across England's top division can officially buy, sell, and loan players. Understanding how this system works is crucial for any football fan who wants to follow the intricate world of EPL transfers and player movements.</p>
                        
                        <h3>What is the Premier League Transfer Window?</h3>
                        <p>The transfer window is a designated period during which Premier League clubs can register new players and complete transfers. Outside of these windows, clubs cannot make permanent signings, though they can still negotiate deals for future completion. This system was introduced by FIFA in 2002 to bring structure and fairness to the global transfer market.</p>
                        
                        <h3>Transfer Window Dates and Timing</h3>
                        <p>The Premier League operates with two main transfer windows each season. The summer transfer window typically opens on June 10th and closes at 11 PM BST on August 31st, giving clubs approximately 12 weeks to complete their business. This extended period allows teams to plan their squads for the upcoming season, negotiate complex deals, and conduct thorough medical examinations.</p>
                        
                        <p>The winter transfer window, often called the January window, runs from January 1st to January 31st at 11 PM GMT. This shorter four-week period is designed for clubs to make mid-season adjustments, address injury crises, or strengthen their squads for the final push of the campaign.</p>
                        
                        <h3>EPL Transfer Rules and Regulations</h3>
                        <p>Premier League transfer rules are comprehensive and strictly enforced. All transfers must be completed through the FA's Transfer Matching System (TMS), ensuring proper documentation and compliance. Clubs must submit all necessary paperwork, including International Transfer Certificates (ITC) for overseas players, before the window deadline.</p>
                        
                        <p>The Financial Fair Play (FFP) regulations also play a crucial role in Premier League transfers. Clubs must demonstrate they can meet their financial obligations and cannot spend beyond their means. The Premier League's Profit and Sustainability Rules limit losses to ¬£105 million over three years, significantly impacting transfer strategies and spending power.</p>
                        
                        <h3>Emergency Loan Windows and Exceptions</h3>
                        <p>While the main transfer windows are rigid, the Premier League does allow for emergency loans in exceptional circumstances. If a club has fewer than 21 players available due to injuries or other unforeseen circumstances, they may apply for special dispensation to sign a goalkeeper on an emergency loan outside the transfer window.</p>
                        
                        <h3>Impact on Premier League Clubs</h3>
                        <p>The transfer window system creates intense periods of activity that can transform entire squads. Top clubs often complete their major signings early in the summer window to ensure new players can participate in pre-season training and gel with their teammates. Smaller clubs might wait until later in the window to identify value signings or players released by bigger clubs.</p>
                        
                        <p>The deadline day phenomenon has become a spectacle in itself, with clubs rushing to complete last-minute deals. This creates a frenzied atmosphere where transfer fees can inflate dramatically, and clubs may make panic signings that don't align with their long-term strategies.</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="sidebar-content">
                        <div class="quick-facts-box">
                            <h4>Quick Facts</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li><strong>Summer Window:</strong> June 10 - August 31</li>
                                <li><strong>Winter Window:</strong> January 1 - January 31</li>

                                <li><strong>FFP Limit:</strong> ¬£105m losses over 3 years</li>
                                <li><strong>Registration System:</strong> Transfer Matching System (TMS)</li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- How Transfer Deals Work Section -->
        <section class="seo-content-section" id="transfer-process-guide">
            <div class="content-container">
                <h2 class="section-title">How Transfer Deals Work</h2>
                <div class="content-grid">
                    <div class="main-content">
                        <p class="lead-paragraph">Behind every Premier League transfer lies a complex web of negotiations, medical examinations, legal procedures, and financial arrangements. Understanding this intricate process reveals why some transfers happen quickly while others drag on for months or collapse entirely.</p>
                        
                        <h3>The Transfer Process: Step by Step</h3>
                        <p>A typical Premier League transfer begins with the buying club identifying a target and making initial contact with the selling club. This first approach often comes through intermediaries or agents who gauge interest and establish whether a deal is feasible. The buying club must first agree a transfer fee with the selling club before any meaningful negotiations with the player can begin.</p>
                        
                        <h3>Club-to-Club Negotiations</h3>
                        <p>Once clubs begin formal negotiations, several factors come into play. The transfer fee is just the beginning - clubs must also negotiate payment structure, including upfront payments, installments, and potential add-ons based on performance or achievements. Sell-on clauses, which guarantee the selling club a percentage of any future transfer fee, are increasingly common in modern football transfers.</p>
                        
                        <p>Buy-back clauses and first refusal rights add another layer of complexity to Premier League transfers. These provisions allow selling clubs to repurchase players at predetermined prices or match competing offers in the future. Such arrangements are particularly common when established clubs sell young players to smaller teams for development.</p>
                        
                        <h3>Personal Terms and Contract Negotiations</h3>
                        <p>After clubs agree on a fee, attention turns to personal terms between the buying club and the player. This stage involves negotiating salary, contract length, bonuses, image rights, and various clauses that protect both parties. Players may demand release clauses, loyalty bonuses, or specific provisions about playing time and squad status.</p>
                        
                        <p>The role of agents becomes crucial during personal terms negotiations. Modern football agents often represent multiple parties in a single deal, creating potential conflicts of interest that must be carefully managed. Agent fees can represent 10-20% of the total transfer cost, significantly impacting the overall economics of Premier League transfers.</p>
                        
                        <h3>Medical Examinations and Due Diligence</h3>
                        <p>The medical examination is a critical checkpoint in any transfer deal. Premier League clubs conduct extensive medical assessments that go far beyond basic fitness tests. These examinations include cardiovascular screening, musculoskeletal assessments, injury history reviews, and sometimes psychological evaluations.</p>
                        
                        <p>Failed medicals can derail even the most advanced transfer negotiations. Clubs invest significant resources in their medical departments precisely because identifying potential injury risks can save millions in the long term. Some transfers include specific clauses that allow deals to be restructured or cancelled if certain medical conditions are discovered.</p>
                        
                        <h3>Legal Documentation and Registration</h3>
                        <p>The legal aspects of Premier League transfers involve multiple documents and registrations. The primary transfer agreement outlines all terms between clubs, while the player's employment contract governs their relationship with the new club. International transfers require additional documentation, including International Transfer Certificates and work permits for non-EU players post-Brexit.</p>
                        
                        <h3>Agent Fees and Third-Party Involvement</h3>
                        <p>Agent fees have become a significant component of modern transfer deals. The Premier League requires clubs to publicly report agent fees, revealing that top clubs often spend tens of millions annually on intermediary services. These fees cover not just transfer negotiations but also contract renewals, endorsement deals, and ongoing player representation.</p>
                        
                        <p>The involvement of multiple agents in a single transfer can complicate proceedings significantly. A selling club's agent, buying club's agent, and player's representative may all have different priorities and commission structures, requiring careful coordination to ensure all parties reach agreement.</p>
                        
                        <h3>Payment Structures and Financial Arrangements</h3>
                        <p>Modern Premier League transfers rarely involve single lump-sum payments. Instead, clubs structure deals with initial payments, installments spread over several years, and performance-related add-ons. This approach helps clubs manage cash flow and comply with Financial Fair Play regulations while still securing their transfer targets.</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="sidebar-content">
                        <div class="process-timeline">
                            <h4>Transfer Timeline</h4>
                            <div class="timeline-item">
                                <span class="step">1</span>
