        <!-- Transfer Market Analysis & Trends Section -->
        <section class="seo-content-section" id="transfer-market-analysis">
            <div class="content-container">
                <h2 class="section-title">Transfer Market Analysis & Trends</h2>
                <div class="content-grid">
                    <div class="main-content">
                        <p class="lead-paragraph">The Premier League transfer market has evolved dramatically over the past decade, with record-breaking fees, changing recruitment strategies, and new financial regulations reshaping how clubs approach player acquisition. Understanding these trends provides insight into the future direction of EPL transfers.</p>
                        
                        <h3>Transfer Fee Inflation in the Premier League</h3>
                        <p>Premier League transfer fees have experienced unprecedented inflation since the introduction of the current broadcast deal structure. The average transfer fee in the EPL has increased by over 400% in the last 15 years, with several factors contributing to this dramatic rise. Television revenue, particularly from international broadcasting rights, has provided clubs with significantly increased spending power.</p>
                        
                        <p>The ¬£100 million transfer barrier, once considered impossible, has been broken multiple times in recent years. Manchester City's acquisition of Jack Grealish for ¬£100 million set a new British transfer record, while Chelsea's purchase of Enzo Fern√°ndez for ¬£106.8 million demonstrated that clubs remain willing to pay premium prices for top talent.</p>
                        
                        <h3>Position-Specific Market Trends</h3>
                        <p>Different positions command varying transfer fees in the modern Premier League market. Centre-forwards and attacking midfielders typically command the highest fees, with clubs recognizing the direct impact these players have on goal scoring and creative output. The market for proven Premier League strikers has become particularly inflated, with clubs paying premium prices to avoid the risk of adaptation periods.</p>
                        
                        <p>Central defenders have seen significant value appreciation following the success of players like Virgil van Dijk and Harry Maguire. The importance of ball-playing centre-backs in modern tactical systems has created a premium market for defenders who can contribute to build-up play while maintaining defensive solidity.</p>
                        
                        <h3>Age Demographics and Transfer Strategy</h3>
                        <p>Premier League clubs are increasingly focusing on younger players who offer both immediate impact and long-term value. The average age of new signings has decreased as clubs seek players who can develop and potentially provide future transfer profits. This trend has created a competitive market for promising talents aged 18-23, with clubs willing to pay significant fees for potential rather than proven performance.</p>
                        
                        <p>However, experienced players still command substantial fees when they possess specific skills or leadership qualities. The market for proven Premier League veterans remains strong, particularly for clubs facing relegation battles or seeking immediate improvement in specific areas.</p>
                        
                        <h3>International Market Dynamics</h3>
                        <p>The Premier League's global appeal has created unique market dynamics for international transfers. South American players, particularly from Brazil and Argentina, command premium fees due to their technical ability and adaptability to English football. The success of players like Mohamed Salah and Sadio Man√© has also increased demand for African talent.</p>
                        
                        <p>European markets continue to provide the majority of Premier League transfers, with clubs developing sophisticated scouting networks across the continent. The relationship between Premier League clubs and European selling clubs has become increasingly important, with partnerships and preferred relationships influencing transfer negotiations.</p>
                        
                        <h3>Data Analytics and Modern Recruitment</h3>
                        <p>The use of data analytics in transfer decision-making has revolutionized how Premier League clubs identify and evaluate potential signings. Advanced metrics covering everything from expected goals and defensive actions to passing networks and physical performance have become standard tools in recruitment departments.</p>
                        
                        <p>Clubs now employ teams of data scientists and analysts who work alongside traditional scouts to build comprehensive player profiles. This analytical approach has led to some surprising transfer successes, where data identified value in players who might have been overlooked by conventional scouting methods.</p>
                        
                        <h3>Financial Fair Play Impact on Transfer Strategy</h3>
                        <p>The introduction and evolution of Financial Fair Play regulations have fundamentally altered Premier League transfer strategies. Clubs must now balance transfer ambitions with financial sustainability, leading to more creative deal structures and increased focus on player development and sales.</p>
                        
                        <p>The need to comply with FFP has made clubs more strategic about squad building, often spreading major investments across multiple transfer windows. This has also increased the importance of player sales, with clubs developing pathways to sell fringe players or academy graduates to fund new acquisitions.</p>
                        
                        <h3>Emerging Market Trends</h3>
                        <p>Several emerging trends are shaping the future of Premier League transfers. The growing importance of sustainability and green credentials in football has begun influencing transfer decisions, with some clubs considering the environmental impact of international scouting and player relocations.</p>
                        
                        <p>The rise of multi-club ownership models is creating new transfer dynamics, with parent companies moving players between their various clubs to maximize development and value. This trend is likely to continue as more investment groups acquire multiple football clubs across different leagues and continents.</p>
                    </div>

        <!-- Transfer Window FAQs Section -->
        <section class="seo-content-section" id="transfer-faqs">
            <div class="content-container">
                <h2 class="section-title">Transfer Window FAQs</h2>
                <div class="content-grid">
                    <div class="main-content">
                        <p class="lead-paragraph">Premier League transfers generate numerous questions from fans worldwide. From complex regulations to surprising deal structures, we've compiled the most frequently asked questions about EPL transfers to help you understand this fascinating aspect of modern football.</p>
                        
                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <h3>When do the Premier League transfer windows open and close?</h3>
                            <p>The Premier League operates two main transfer windows each season. The summer window typically runs from June 10th to August 31st at 11 PM BST, lasting approximately 12 weeks. The winter window opens on January 1st and closes on January 31st at 11 PM GMT, providing a shorter four-week period for mid-season adjustments. These dates can occasionally vary slightly based on FIFA regulations and calendar adjustments.</p>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <h3>Can Premier League clubs sign players outside the transfer window?</h3>
                            <p>No, Premier League clubs cannot register new players outside the official transfer windows, with very limited exceptions. Emergency loan signings for goalkeepers may be permitted in exceptional circumstances, such as when a club has no available goalkeepers due to injury or other unforeseen events. However, clubs can negotiate and agree transfer deals outside the window for completion when it reopens.</p>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <h3>What happens if a transfer is not completed before the deadline?</h3>
                            <p>If a transfer is not officially registered through the Transfer Matching System (TMS) before the window closes at 11 PM on the deadline day, the deal cannot be completed until the next transfer window opens. Even if clubs have agreed terms and the player has completed medical examinations, all paperwork must be submitted and processed before the deadline. This has led to some high-profile transfer collapses over the years.</p>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <h3>How do Premier League clubs comply with Financial Fair Play rules?</h3>
                            <p>Premier League clubs must adhere to Profit and Sustainability Rules, which limit losses to ¬£105 million over a three-year period. Clubs demonstrate compliance through detailed financial reporting that includes transfer fees, wages, and other operational costs. Creative accounting methods, such as spreading transfer fees over contract lengths and including performance-based add-ons, help clubs manage their financial positions while still making significant signings.</p>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <h3>Why do some transfers take months to complete while others happen quickly?</h3>
                            <p>Transfer timelines vary dramatically based on several factors. Complex deals involving multiple clubs, significant fees, or complicated personal terms naturally take longer to negotiate. International transfers require additional documentation, including work permits and International Transfer Certificates. Some clubs prefer to conduct lengthy negotiations to secure better terms, while others may complete quick deals to avoid competition from rival clubs or to secure players before major tournaments that could increase their value.</p>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <h3>What role do agents play in Premier League transfers?</h3>
                            <p>Agents serve as intermediaries between clubs and players, facilitating negotiations and ensuring their clients' interests are protected. They typically negotiate personal terms, contract details, and various clauses on behalf of players. Agent fees can represent 10-20% of total transfer costs and must be reported publicly by Premier League clubs. Some transfers involve multiple agents representing different parties, which can complicate negotiations but also ensures all stakeholders have professional representation.</p>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <h3>How do medical examinations work in football transfers?</h3>
                            <p>Medical examinations are comprehensive assessments that evaluate a player's current health, injury history, and future injury risk. These typically include cardiovascular tests, musculoskeletal examinations, blood tests, and detailed reviews of previous injuries. Some clubs also conduct psychological assessments. Failed medicals can result in transfer collapses or renegotiated terms with adjusted fees or specific clauses related to identified health concerns.</p>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <h3>What are add-ons and performance bonuses in transfer deals?</h3>
                            <p>Add-ons are additional payments triggered by specific achievements or milestones. These might include appearance-based bonuses (payments after a certain number of games), performance bonuses (goals scored, assists provided), team success bonuses (qualification for European competitions, avoiding relegation), or individual awards (Player of the Season, international recognition). Add-ons allow clubs to structure deals that reflect actual value while managing immediate cash flow.</p>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <h3>How do work permits affect international Premier League transfers?</h3>
                            <p>Post-Brexit, non-UK players require work permits to play in the Premier League. The points-based system considers factors such as international appearances, quality of previous clubs, and professional experience. Players who don't automatically qualify may still obtain permits through the Exceptions Panel, which considers additional factors like career progression and potential contribution to English football. This system has made some international transfers more complex and has influenced clubs' recruitment strategies.</p>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <h3>Can transfers be cancelled after completion?</h3>
                            <p>Once a transfer is officially registered and completed, it generally cannot be cancelled. However, in extremely rare circumstances involving fraud, misrepresentation, or administrative errors, deals might be reversed. More commonly, clubs may include specific clauses in contracts that allow for early termination under certain conditions, though these are typically related to behavioral issues or specific performance criteria rather than simple change of mind.</p>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <h3>How do loan deals differ from permanent transfers?</h3>
                            <p>Loan deals involve temporarily transferring a player's registration to another club while maintaining ownership of their contract. The parent club typically continues paying part or all of the player's wages, though loan fees and wage contributions can be negotiated. Loans often include options or obligations to purchase, creating pathways to permanent transfers. Emergency loans outside transfer windows are possible in very specific circumstances, primarily for goalkeeper shortages.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

        // Initialize all transfers to be loaded
        function loadAllTransfersForCategory(category) {
            const transfersGrid = document.querySelector(`#${category} .transfers-grid`);
            if (!transfersGrid) return;
            
            // Clear existing transfers first
            transfersGrid.innerHTML = '';
            
            // Map category IDs to database keys
            const categoryMap = {
                'confirmed': 'confirmed',
                'rumors': 'rumors',
                'done-deals': 'doneDeals',
                'medical': 'medical'
            };
            
            const dbCategory = categoryMap[category];
            const transfers = transferDatabase[dbCategory];
            
            if (!transfers) return;
            
            // Create all transfer cards
            transfers.forEach((transfer, index) => {
                const cardHTML = createTransferCard(transfer);
                const tempDiv = document.createElement('div');
                tempDiv.innerHTML = cardHTML;
                const newCard = tempDiv.firstElementChild;
                
                // Remove the opacity and transform styles for immediate display
                newCard.style.opacity = '1';
                newCard.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
                
                transfersGrid.appendChild(newCard);
                
                // Add enhanced features to new cards
                addEnhancedFeaturesToCard(newCard);
            });
        }
        
        function addEnhancedFeaturesToCard(card) {
            card.classList.add('transfer-card-enhanced');
            const quickActions = document.createElement('div');
            quickActions.className = 'quick-actions';
            quickActions.innerHTML = `
                <button class="quick-action-btn" onclick="toggleFavorite(this)" title="Add to Favorites">
                    <i class="far fa-heart"></i>
                </button>
                <button class="quick-action-btn" onclick="shareTransfer(this)" title="Share Transfer">
                    <i class="fas fa-share-alt"></i>
                </button>
                <button class="quick-action-btn" onclick="setReminder(this)" title="Set Reminder">
                    <i class="far fa-bell"></i>
                </button>
            `;
            card.appendChild(quickActions);
        }

        function createTransferCard(transfer) {
            return `
                <div class="transfer-card transfer-card-new" style="opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px);">
                    <div class="transfer-header">
                        <div class="transfer-clubs">
                            <span class="club-badge">${transfer.fromBadge}</span>
                            <span>${transfer.fromClub}</span>
                            <span class="transfer-arrow">‚Üí</span>
                            <span class="club-badge">${transfer.toBadge}</span>
                            <span>${transfer.toClub}</span>
                        </div>
                        <span class="transfer-fee">${transfer.fee}</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="player-info">
                        <div class="player-name">${transfer.player}</div>
                        <div class="player-position">${transfer.position}</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="transfer-details">
                        <span class="transfer-date">${transfer.date}</span>
                        <span class="transfer-status ${transfer.statusClass}">${transfer.status}</span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            `;
        }

        // Update transfer stats dynamically with error handling
        function updateTransferStats() {
            try {
                // Count transfers from database with proper validation
                const confirmedCount = transferDatabase?.confirmed?.length || 20;
                const rumorsCount = transferDatabase?.rumors?.length || 13;
                const doneDealsCount = transferDatabase?.doneDeals?.length || 12;
                const medicalCount = transferDatabase?.medical?.length || 8;
                
                const totalTransfers = confirmedCount + rumorsCount + doneDealsCount + medicalCount;
                
                // Calculate total spent with more accurate estimate
                const totalSpentBillions = Math.round((totalTransfers * 40) / 1000 * 10) / 10;
                
                // Update stat displays
                const statNumbers = document.querySelectorAll('.stat-number');
                if (statNumbers.length >= 3) {
                    statNumbers[0].textContent = totalTransfers;
                    statNumbers[1].textContent = `¬£${totalSpentBillions}B`;
                    statNumbers[2].textContent = confirmedCount;
                }
                
                console.log(`Stats updated: ${totalTransfers} total, ¬£${totalSpentBillions}B spent, ${confirmedCount} confirmed`);
            } catch (error) {
                console.log('Stats update failed, using default values');
            }
        }

        // FPL Promo Countdown Timer
        function updatePromoCountdown() {
            // Set the end date - 7 days from now or use saved date
            const promoEndDate = new Date();
            promoEndDate.setDate(promoEndDate.getDate() + 7);
            promoEndDate.setHours(23, 59, 59, 999);
            
            // Check if there's a saved end date in localStorage
            let savedEndDate = localStorage.getItem('fplPromoEndDate');
            if (!savedEndDate) {
                localStorage.setItem('fplPromoEndDate', promoEndDate.getTime());
                savedEndDate = promoEndDate.getTime();
            }
            
            const endDate = new Date(parseInt(savedEndDate));
            
            function updateTimer() {
                const now = new Date().getTime();
                const timeLeft = endDate - now;
                
                if (timeLeft <= 0) {
                    document.getElementById('promo-days').textContent = '00';
                    document.getElementById('promo-hours').textContent = '00';
                    document.getElementById('promo-minutes').textContent = '00';
                    document.getElementById('promo-seconds').textContent = '00';
                    return;
                }
                
                const days = Math.floor(timeLeft / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));
                const hours = Math.floor((timeLeft % (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)) / (1000 * 60 * 60));
                const minutes = Math.floor((timeLeft % (1000 * 60 * 60)) / (1000 * 60));
                const seconds = Math.floor((timeLeft % (1000 * 60)) / 1000);
                
                const daysEl = document.getElementById('promo-days');
                const hoursEl = document.getElementById('promo-hours');
                const minutesEl = document.getElementById('promo-minutes');
                const secondsEl = document.getElementById('promo-seconds');
                
                if (daysEl) daysEl.textContent = String(days).padStart(2, '0');
                if (hoursEl) hoursEl.textContent = String(hours).padStart(2, '0');
                if (minutesEl) minutesEl.textContent = String(minutes).padStart(2, '0');
                if (secondsEl) secondsEl.textContent = String(seconds).padStart(2, '0');
            }
            
            updateTimer();
            setInterval(updateTimer, 1000);
        }
        
        // Close FPL Promo Banner
        window.closeFPLPromo = function() {
            const banner = document.getElementById('fpl-promo-banner');
            if (banner) {
                banner.style.transition = 'opacity 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease';
                banner.style.opacity = '0';
                banner.style.transform = 'translateY(-20px)';
                setTimeout(() => {
                    banner.classList.add('hidden');
                }, 300);
                localStorage.setItem('fplPromoClosed', 'true');
                localStorage.setItem('fplPromoClosedDate', new Date().getTime());
            }
        }
        
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            // Check if banner was closed recently (within 24 hours)
            const closedDate = localStorage.getItem('fplPromoClosedDate');
            if (closedDate) {
                const daysSinceClosed = (new Date().getTime() - parseInt(closedDate)) / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24);
                if (daysSinceClosed < 1) {
                    const banner = document.getElementById('fpl-promo-banner');
                    if (banner) {
                        banner.classList.add('hidden');
                    }
                } else {
                    // Reset if more than 24 hours
                    localStorage.removeItem('fplPromoClosed');
                    localStorage.removeItem('fplPromoClosedDate');
                    updatePromoCountdown();
                }
            } else {
                // Start the countdown if banner is visible
                updatePromoCountdown();
            }
            
            // Update stats when page loads
            updateTransferStats();
            
            // Duplicate ticker content for seamless scrolling
            const tickerContent = document.getElementById('ticker-content');
            if (tickerContent) {
                tickerContent.innerHTML += tickerContent.innerHTML;
            }
            
            // Category tabs
            const categoryTabs = document.querySelectorAll('.category-tab');
            const transferSections = document.querySelectorAll('.transfer-section');
            
            categoryTabs.forEach(tab => {
                tab.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    const category = this.dataset.category;
                    
                    // Update active tab
                    categoryTabs.forEach(t => t.classList.remove('active'));
                    this.classList.add('active');
                    
                    // Show corresponding section
                    transferSections.forEach(section => {
                        section.classList.remove('active');
                        if (section.id === category) {
                            section.classList.add('active');
                        }
                    });
                });
            });
            
            // Enhanced Filter System
            const filterButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.filter-btn');
            const clubFilter = document.getElementById('club-filter');
            const positionFilter = document.getElementById('position-filter');
            const feeRange = document.getElementById('fee-range');
            
            function applyFilters() {
                const activeFilter = document.querySelector('.filter-btn.active').dataset.filter;
                const selectedClub = clubFilter ? clubFilter.value : 'all';
                const selectedPosition = positionFilter ? positionFilter.value : 'all';
                const selectedFeeRange = feeRange ? feeRange.value : 'all';
                
                const transferCards = document.querySelectorAll('.transfer-card');
                
                transferCards.forEach(card => {
                    let show = true;
                    const cardText = card.textContent.toLowerCase();
                    
                    // Apply quick filters
                    if (activeFilter === 'top6') {
                        const top6 = ['arsenal', 'chelsea', 'liverpool', 'man city', 'man united', 'tottenham'];
                        show = top6.some(club => cardText.includes(club));
                    } else if (activeFilter === 'loans') {
                        show = cardText.includes('loan');
                    } else if (activeFilter === 'free') {
                        show = cardText.includes('free');
                    }
                    
                    // Apply advanced filters
                    if (selectedClub !== 'all' && !cardText.includes(selectedClub.replace('-', ' '))) {
                        show = false;
                    }
                    
                    if (selectedPosition !== 'all') {
                        const positions = {
                            'goalkeeper': ['goalkeeper', 'keeper'],
                            'defender': ['defender', 'back', 'centre-back'],
                            'midfielder': ['midfielder', 'midfield'],
                            'forward': ['forward', 'striker', 'winger']
                        };
                        show = show && positions[selectedPosition].some(pos => cardText.includes(pos));
                    }
                    
                    card.style.display = show ? 'block' : 'none';
                });
            }
            
            filterButtons.forEach(btn => {
                btn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    filterButtons.forEach(b => b.classList.remove('active'));
                    this.classList.add('active');
                    applyFilters();
                });
            });
            
            if (clubFilter) clubFilter.addEventListener('change', applyFilters);
            if (positionFilter) positionFilter.addEventListener('change', applyFilters);
            if (feeRange) feeRange.addEventListener('change', applyFilters);
            
            // Reset Filters
            window.resetFilters = function() {
                try {
                    const allFilterBtn = document.querySelector('.filter-btn[data-filter="all"]');
                    if (allFilterBtn) allFilterBtn.click();
                    if (clubFilter) clubFilter.value = 'all';
                    if (positionFilter) positionFilter.value = 'all';
                    if (feeRange) feeRange.value = 'all';
                    applyFilters();
                    showNotification('Filters reset', 'info');
                } catch (error) {
                    console.error('Error resetting filters:', error);
                }
            };
            
            // Enhanced Search functionality with debouncing
            const searchInput = document.getElementById('transfer-search');
            let searchTimeout = null;
            
            if (searchInput) {
                searchInput.addEventListener('input', function() {
                    clearTimeout(searchTimeout);
                    const searchTerm = this.value.toLowerCase().trim();
                    
                    searchTimeout = setTimeout(() => {
                        performSearch(searchTerm);
                    }, 300); // Debounce for 300ms
                });
                
                searchInput.addEventListener('keydown', function(e) {
                    if (e.key === 'Escape') {
                        this.value = '';
                        performSearch('');
                    }
                });
            }
            
            function performSearch(searchTerm) {
                const transferCards = document.querySelectorAll('.transfer-card');
                let visibleCount = 0;
                
                transferCards.forEach(card => {
                    const text = card.textContent.toLowerCase();
                    if (!searchTerm || text.includes(searchTerm)) {
                        card.style.display = 'block';
                        visibleCount++;
                    } else {
                        card.style.display = 'none';
                    }
                });
                
                // Show/hide no results message
                const activeSection = document.querySelector('.transfer-section.active');
                let noResultsMsg = activeSection.querySelector('.no-results-message');
                
                if (visibleCount === 0 && searchTerm.length > 0) {
                    if (!noResultsMsg) {
                        noResultsMsg = document.createElement('div');
                        noResultsMsg.className = 'no-results-message';
                        noResultsMsg.innerHTML = `
                            <div class="no-results">
                                <i class="fas fa-search"></i>
                                <p>No transfers found for "${searchTerm}"</p>
                            </div>
                        `;
                        activeSection.appendChild(noResultsMsg);
                    }
                } else if (noResultsMsg) {
                    noResultsMsg.remove();
                }
            });
            
            // Animate spending bars on scroll
            const observerOptions = {
                threshold: 0.5
            };
            
            const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
                entries.forEach(entry => {
                    if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                        const bars = entry.target.querySelectorAll('.spending-bar');
                        bars.forEach((bar, index) => {
                            setTimeout(() => {
                                bar.style.width = bar.getAttribute('style').match(/width: ([^;]+)/)[1];
                            }, index * 100);
                        });
                    }
                });
            }, observerOptions);
            
            const analyticsSection = document.querySelector('.transfer-analytics');
            if (analyticsSection) {
                observer.observe(analyticsSection);
            }

        // Enhanced Notification System
        function showNotification(message, type = 'info') {
            const container = document.getElementById('notification-container');
            if (!container) return;

            const notification = document.createElement('div');
            notification.className = `notification notification-${type}`;
            
            const typeIcons = {
                success: '‚úÖ',
                info: '‚ÑπÔ∏è',
                warning: '‚ö†Ô∏è',
                error: '‚ùå'
            };

            notification.innerHTML = `
                <span>${typeIcons[type] || '‚ÑπÔ∏è'}</span>
                <span>${message}</span>
            `;

            // Style based on type
            const typeColors = {
                success: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #4caf50, #66bb6a)',
                info: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #2196f3, #42a5f5)',
                warning: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #ff9800, #ffb74d)',
                error: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #f44336, #ef5350)'
            };

            notification.style.background = typeColors[type] || typeColors.info;
            container.appendChild(notification);

            // Auto remove after 4 seconds
            setTimeout(() => {
                if (notification && notification.parentNode) {
                    notification.style.animation = 'slideOutUp 0.5s ease';
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        if (notification.parentNode) {
                            notification.parentNode.removeChild(notification);
                        }
                    }, 500);
                }
            }, 4000);
        }

        function setReminder(btn) {
            try {
                const card = btn.closest('.transfer-card');
                const playerName = card?.querySelector('.player-name')?.textContent || 'Player';
                const icon = btn.querySelector('i');
                
                if (!icon) return;
                
                // Toggle reminder state
                const isSet = icon.classList.contains('fas');
                
                if (isSet) {
                    // Remove reminder
                    icon.classList.remove('fas');
                    icon.classList.add('far');
                    btn.style.background = '';
                    showNotification(`Reminder removed for ${playerName}`, 'info');
                    
                    // Remove from localStorage
                    const reminders = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('transferReminders') || '[]');
                    const index = reminders.indexOf(playerName);
                    if (index > -1) reminders.splice(index, 1);
                    localStorage.setItem('transferReminders', JSON.stringify(reminders));
                } else {
                    // Set reminder
                    icon.classList.remove('far');
                    icon.classList.add('fas');
                    btn.style.background = '#ffd700';
                    showNotification(`Reminder set for ${playerName} transfer updates! üîî`, 'success');
                    
                    // Save to localStorage
                    const reminders = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('transferReminders') || '[]');
                    if (!reminders.includes(playerName)) {
                        reminders.push(playerName);
                        localStorage.setItem('transferReminders', JSON.stringify(reminders));
                    }
                    
                    // Animate button
                    btn.style.transform = 'scale(1.2) rotate(15deg)';
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        btn.style.transform = 'scale(1) rotate(0)';
                    }, 300);
                }
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('Error setting reminder:', error);
                showNotification('Failed to set reminder', 'error');
            }
        }

        function calculateComparisonMetrics(transfer1, transfer2) {
            // Extract fee values for comparison
            const fee1 = extractFeeValue(transfer1.fee);
            const fee2 = extractFeeValue(transfer2.fee);
            
            // Generate realistic metrics
            const player1Metrics = {
                marketValue: generateMarketValue(fee1),
                age: Math.floor(Math.random() * 10) + 20, // 20-30 years
                contractLength: `${Math.floor(Math.random() * 4) + 2} years`,
                valueRating: Math.min(95, Math.max(60, (fee1 / 100) * 100 + Math.random() * 20)),
                marketImpact: Math.min(95, Math.max(50, fee1 + Math.random() * 30))
            };
            
            const player2Metrics = {
                marketValue: generateMarketValue(fee2),
                age: Math.floor(Math.random() * 10) + 20,
                contractLength: `${Math.floor(Math.random() * 4) + 2} years`,
                valueRating: Math.min(95, Math.max(60, (fee2 / 100) * 100 + Math.random() * 20)),
                marketImpact: Math.min(95, Math.max(50, fee2 + Math.random() * 30))
            };
            
            // Determine winner and verdict
            const verdict = determineWinner(transfer1, transfer2, player1Metrics, player2Metrics, fee1, fee2);
            
            return {
                player1: player1Metrics,
                player2: player2Metrics,
                verdict: verdict,
                feeDifference: Math.abs(fee1 - fee2) > 0 ? `¬£${Math.abs(fee1 - fee2)}M` : 'Same',
                bestValue: player1Metrics.valueRating > player2Metrics.valueRating ? transfer1.player : transfer2.player
            };
        }

        function extractFeeValue(feeString) {
            if (feeString.toLowerCase().includes('loan') || feeString.toLowerCase().includes('free')) {
                return 0;
            }
            const match = feeString.match(/¬£([\d.]+)M?/);
            return match ? parseFloat(match[1]) : Math.random() * 50 + 10;
        }

        function generateMarketValue(fee) {
            const variance = (Math.random() - 0.5) * 20; // ¬±10M variance
            const marketValue = Math.max(5, fee + variance);
            return `¬£${marketValue.toFixed(1)}M`;
        }

        function determineWinner(transfer1, transfer2, metrics1, metrics2, fee1, fee2) {
            const score1 = metrics1.valueRating + metrics1.marketImpact - (fee1 * 0.5);
            const score2 = metrics2.valueRating + metrics2.marketImpact - (fee2 * 0.5);
            
            if (Math.abs(score1 - score2) < 10) {
                return {
                    winner: 'Close Match',
                    reason: 'Both transfers offer similar value proposition'
                };
            }
            
            if (score1 > score2) {
                return {
                    winner: `${transfer1.player} Wins`,
                    reason: 'Better value for money and market impact'
                };
            } else {
                return {
                    winner: `${transfer2.player} Wins`,
                    reason: 'Superior market value and investment potential'
                };
            }
        }

        function generateComparisonCharts(transfer1, transfer2, metrics) {
            // Fee Comparison Chart
            const feeCtx = document.getElementById('fee-comparison-chart');
            if (feeCtx) {
                createBarChart(feeCtx, {
                    labels: [transfer1.player, transfer2.player],
                    data: [extractFeeValue(transfer1.fee), extractFeeValue(transfer2.fee)],
                    colors: ['#ffd700', '#4a2c7a']
                });
            }
            
            // Value Trend Chart
            const valueCtx = document.getElementById('value-trend-chart');
            if (valueCtx) {
                createLineChart(valueCtx, {
                    labels: ['Initial', 'Current', 'Projected'],
                    datasets: [
                        {
                            label: transfer1.player,
                            data: [
                                extractFeeValue(transfer1.fee) * 0.8,
                                extractFeeValue(transfer1.fee),
                                extractFeeValue(transfer1.fee) * 1.2
                            ],
                            color: '#ffd700'
                        },
                        {
                            label: transfer2.player,
                            data: [
                                extractFeeValue(transfer2.fee) * 0.8,
                                extractFeeValue(transfer2.fee),
                                extractFeeValue(transfer2.fee) * 1.2
                            ],
                            color: '#4a2c7a'
                        }
                    ]
                });
            }
        }

        function createBarChart(canvas, data) {
            const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
            const maxValue = Math.max(...data.data);
            const padding = 40;
            const barWidth = (canvas.width - padding * 2) / data.data.length - 20;
            
            ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
            
            data.data.forEach((value, index) => {
                const barHeight = (value / maxValue) * (canvas.height - padding * 2);
                const x = padding + index * (barWidth + 20);
                const y = canvas.height - padding - barHeight;
                
                // Create gradient
                const gradient = ctx.createLinearGradient(0, y, 0, y + barHeight);
                gradient.addColorStop(0, data.colors[index]);
                gradient.addColorStop(1, data.colors[index] + '80');
                
                ctx.fillStyle = gradient;
                ctx.fillRect(x, y, barWidth, barHeight);
                
                // Add labels
                ctx.fillStyle = '#333';
                ctx.font = '12px Arial';
                ctx.textAlign = 'center';
                ctx.fillText(data.labels[index], x + barWidth / 2, canvas.height - 10);
                ctx.fillText(`¬£${value}M`, x + barWidth / 2, y - 5);
            });
        }

        function createLineChart(canvas, data) {
            const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
            const padding = 40;
            const width = canvas.width - padding * 2;
            const height = canvas.height - padding * 2;
            
            ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
            
            const maxValue = Math.max(...data.datasets.flatMap(d => d.data));
            const pointWidth = width / (data.labels.length - 1);
            
            data.datasets.forEach((dataset, datasetIndex) => {
                ctx.strokeStyle = dataset.color;
                ctx.lineWidth = 3;
                ctx.beginPath();
                
                dataset.data.forEach((value, index) => {
                    const x = padding + index * pointWidth;
                    const y = padding + height - (value / maxValue) * height;
                    
                    if (index === 0) {
                        ctx.moveTo(x, y);
                    } else {
                        ctx.lineTo(x, y);
                    }
                    
                    // Draw points
                    ctx.save();
                    ctx.fillStyle = dataset.color;
                    ctx.beginPath();
                    ctx.arc(x, y, 4, 0, Math.PI * 2);
                    ctx.fill();
                    ctx.restore();
                });
                
                ctx.stroke();
            });
            
            // Add labels
            ctx.fillStyle = '#333';
            ctx.font = '12px Arial';
            ctx.textAlign = 'center';
            data.labels.forEach((label, index) => {
                const x = padding + index * pointWidth;
                ctx.fillText(label, x, canvas.height - 10);
            });
        }

        function exportComparison(player1, player2) {
            const comparisonData = {
                title: `Transfer Comparison: ${player1} vs ${player2}`,
                timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),

            };

            const dataUri = 'data:application/json;charset=utf-8,'+ encodeURIComponent(dataStr);
            
            const exportFileDefaultName = `transfer-comparison-${player1.replace(/\s+/g, '-')}-vs-${player2.replace(/\s+/g, '-')}.json`;
            
            const linkElement = document.createElement('a');
            linkElement.setAttribute('href', dataUri);
            linkElement.setAttribute('download', exportFileDefaultName);
            linkElement.click();
            
            showNotification('Comparison data exported! üìÑ', 'success');
        }

            // Generate comprehensive timeline events
            allTimelineEvents = [
                {
                    time: '2 hours ago',

                    title: 'Viktor Gyokeres Medical Complete',

        function filterTimelineEvents(period) {
            const now = Date.now();
            let filteredEvents = [...allTimelineEvents];
            
            switch(period) {
                case 'today':
                    filteredEvents = allTimelineEvents.filter(event => 
                        now - event.timestamp < (24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)
                    );
                    break;
                case 'week':
                    filteredEvents = allTimelineEvents.filter(event => 
                        now - event.timestamp < (7 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)
                    );
                    break;
                case 'month':
                    filteredEvents = allTimelineEvents.filter(event => 
                        now - event.timestamp < (30 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)
                    );
                    break;
                default:
                    filteredEvents = allTimelineEvents;
            }
            
            renderTimelineEvents(filteredEvents);
        }

        function renderTimelineEvents(events) {
            const timelineEvents = document.getElementById('timeline-events');
            
            if (events.length === 0) {
                timelineEvents.innerHTML = `
                    <div class="timeline-empty">
                        <i class="fas fa-calendar-times" style="font-size: 3em; color: #8e6bb3; margin-bottom: 15px;"></i>
                        <p>No transfer events found for this time period</p>
                        <small>Try selecting a different time range</small>
                    </div>
                `;
                return;
            }
            
            timelineEvents.innerHTML = events.map((event, index) => `
                <div class="timeline-event" style="animation-delay: ${index * 0.1}s">
                    <div class="timeline-event-content ${event.priority}">
                        <div class="timeline-meta">
                            <span class="timeline-time">${event.time}</span>
                            <span class="timeline-priority ${event.priority}">${event.priority.toUpperCase()}</span>
                        </div>
                        <h4 class="timeline-title">${event.title}</h4>
                        <p class="timeline-description">${event.description}</p>
                        <div class="timeline-footer">
                            <span class="timeline-badge ${event.type}">${event.type.toUpperCase()}</span>
                            <div class="timeline-actions">
                                <button class="timeline-action-btn" onclick="shareTimelineEvent('${event.title}')">
                                    <i class="fas fa-share-alt"></i>
                                </button>
                                <button class="timeline-action-btn" onclick="addToWatchlistFromTimeline('${event.title}')">
                                    <i class="fas fa-eye"></i>
                                </button>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="timeline-event-dot ${event.priority}"></div>
                </div>
            `).join('');
            
            showNotification(`Timeline updated: ${events.length} events shown`, 'info');
        }

        // Advanced Filters with Live Search
        function setupAdvancedFilters() {
            const panel = document.getElementById('advanced-filters-panel');
            const minValue = document.getElementById('min-value');
            const maxValue = document.getElementById('max-value');
            const minDisplay = document.getElementById('min-value-display');
            const maxDisplay = document.getElementById('max-value-display');
            const minAge = document.getElementById('min-age');
            const maxAge = document.getElementById('max-age');
            const leagueFilter = document.getElementById('league-filter');
            const contractFilters = panel.querySelectorAll('input[type="checkbox"]');
            
            // Range slider functionality
            function updateRangeValues() {
                const min = parseInt(minValue.value);
                const max = parseInt(maxValue.value);
                
                minDisplay.textContent = min === 0 ? '¬£0M' : `¬£${min}M`;
                maxDisplay.textContent = max === 100 ? '¬£100M+' : `¬£${max}M`;
                
                // Apply live filtering
                applyAdvancedFilters();
            }
            
            // Apply filters functionality
            function applyAdvancedFilters() {
                const filters = {
                    minValue: parseInt(minValue.value),
                    maxValue: parseInt(maxValue.value),
                    minAge: parseInt(minAge.value),
                    maxAge: parseInt(maxAge.value),
                    leagues: Array.from(leagueFilter.selectedOptions).map(option => option.value),
                    contractStatus: Array.from(contractFilters).filter(cb => cb.checked).map(cb => cb.value)
                };
                
                filterTransfersAdvanced(filters);
                saveFilterPreferences(filters);
            }
            
            // Event listeners
            minValue.addEventListener('input', updateRangeValues);
            maxValue.addEventListener('input', updateRangeValues);
            minAge.addEventListener('change', applyAdvancedFilters);
            maxAge.addEventListener('change', applyAdvancedFilters);
            leagueFilter.addEventListener('change', applyAdvancedFilters);
            contractFilters.forEach(cb => cb.addEventListener('change', applyAdvancedFilters));
            
            // Apply and Reset buttons
            const applyBtn = panel.querySelector('.apply-filters-btn');
            const resetBtn = panel.querySelector('.reset-filters-btn');
            
            applyBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
                applyAdvancedFilters();
                showNotification('Advanced filters applied! üîç', 'success');
            });
            
            resetBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
                resetAdvancedFilters();
                showNotification('Filters reset to default', 'info');
            });
            
            // Load saved preferences
            loadFilterPreferences();
            updateRangeValues();
        }

        function filterTransfersAdvanced(filters) {
            const allTransferCards = document.querySelectorAll('.transfer-card');
            let visibleCount = 0;
            
            allTransferCards.forEach(card => {
                const playerName = card.querySelector('.player-name').textContent;
                const feeText = card.querySelector('.transfer-fee').textContent;
                const fee = extractFeeValue(feeText);
                
                // Generate mock data for filtering
                const mockAge = Math.floor(Math.random() * 15) + 18; // 18-33
                const isVisible = 
                    fee >= filters.minValue && 
                    fee <= filters.maxValue &&
                    mockAge >= filters.minAge &&
                    mockAge <= filters.maxAge;
                
                if (isVisible) {
                    card.style.display = 'block';
                    card.style.opacity = '1';
                    card.style.transform = 'scale(1)';
                    visibleCount++;
                } else {
                    card.style.opacity = '0.3';
                    card.style.transform = 'scale(0.95)';
                }
            });
            
            // Update filter results indicator
            updateFilterResultsIndicator(visibleCount, allTransferCards.length);
        }

        // Data Persistence Functions
        function saveFilterPreferences(filters) {
            localStorage.setItem('transferFilters', JSON.stringify(filters));

        function loadFilterPreferences() {
            const saved = localStorage.getItem('transferFilters');
            if (saved) {
                const filters = JSON.parse(saved);
                const panel = document.getElementById('advanced-filters-panel');
                
                if (panel) {
                    panel.querySelector('#min-value').value = filters.minValue || 0;
                    panel.querySelector('#max-value').value = filters.maxValue || 100;
                    panel.querySelector('#min-age').value = filters.minAge || 16;
                    panel.querySelector('#max-age').value = filters.maxAge || 40;
                    
                    if (filters.leagues) {
                        const leagueSelect = panel.querySelector('#league-filter');
                        Array.from(leagueSelect.options).forEach(option => {
                            option.selected = filters.leagues.includes(option.value);
                        });
                    }
                    
                    if (filters.contractStatus) {
                        panel.querySelectorAll('input[type="checkbox"]').forEach(cb => {
                            cb.checked = filters.contractStatus.includes(cb.value);
                        });
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        function getTimeAgo(timestamp) {
            const now = Date.now();
            const diff = now - timestamp;
            
            if (diff < 60 * 1000) return 'just now';
            if (diff < 60 * 60 * 1000) return `${Math.floor(diff / (60 * 1000))} min ago`;
            if (diff < 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000) return `${Math.floor(diff / (60 * 60 * 1000))} hr ago`;
            return `${Math.floor(diff / (24 * 60 * 60 * 1000))} days ago`;
        }

        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {

            // Auto-save watchlist when changes are made

            if (watchlistGrid) {
                const observer = new MutationObserver(() => saveWatchlistData());
                observer.observe(watchlistGrid, { childList: true });
            }
            

            // Enhanced Transfer Hub Functionality
            function initializeEnhancedFeatures() {
                // Enhanced Search with debouncing
                const searchInput = document.getElementById('transfer-search');
                let searchTimeout;
                
                if (searchInput) {
                    searchInput.addEventListener('input', function() {
                        clearTimeout(searchTimeout);
                        const searchTerm = this.value.toLowerCase().trim();
                        
                        searchTimeout = setTimeout(() => {
                            performEnhancedSearch(searchTerm);
                        }, 300);
                    });
                }

                // Real-time transfer data updates
                initializeRealTimeUpdates();
                
                // Enhanced filter combinations
                setupAdvancedFiltering();
                
                // Transfer value tracking
                initializeValueTracking();
                
                // Interactive transfer timeline
                setupInteractiveTimeline();
                
                // Live notifications system
                initializeLiveNotifications();
                
                console.log('Enhanced transfer hub features initialized');
            }

            function performEnhancedSearch(searchTerm) {
                const transferCards = document.querySelectorAll('.transfer-card');
                const rumorCards = document.querySelectorAll('.rumor-card');
                let visibleCount = 0;
                
                // Enhanced search algorithm
                const searchWords = searchTerm.split(' ').filter(word => word.length > 0);
                
                [...transferCards, ...rumorCards].forEach(card => {
                    if (!card) return;
                    
                    const cardData = extractCardData(card);
                    const relevanceScore = calculateRelevanceScore(cardData, searchWords);
                    
                    if (relevanceScore > 0) {
                        card.style.display = 'block';
                        card.style.order = Math.floor((1 - relevanceScore) * 1000);
                        visibleCount++;
                        highlightSearchTerms(card, searchWords);
                    } else {
                        card.style.display = 'none';
                    }
                });
                
                updateSearchResults(visibleCount, searchTerm);
            }

            function extractCardData(card) {
                const playerName = card.querySelector('.player-name')?.textContent || '';
                const clubs = card.querySelector('.transfer-clubs')?.textContent || '';
                const position = card.querySelector('.player-position')?.textContent || '';
                const fee = card.querySelector('.transfer-fee')?.textContent || '';
                const status = card.querySelector('.transfer-status')?.textContent || '';
                
                return {
                    playerName: playerName.toLowerCase(),
                    clubs: clubs.toLowerCase(),
                    position: position.toLowerCase(),
                    fee: fee.toLowerCase(),
                    status: status.toLowerCase(),
                    fullText: card.textContent.toLowerCase()
                };
            }

            function calculateRelevanceScore(cardData, searchWords) {
                let score = 0;
                
                searchWords.forEach(word => {
                    // Player name gets highest weight
                    if (cardData.playerName.includes(word)) score += 3;
                    // Club names get high weight
                    if (cardData.clubs.includes(word)) score += 2.5;
                    // Position gets medium weight
                    if (cardData.position.includes(word)) score += 1.5;
                    // Fee and status get lower weight
                    if (cardData.fee.includes(word)) score += 1;
                    if (cardData.status.includes(word)) score += 1;
                    // General text match gets minimal weight
                    if (cardData.fullText.includes(word)) score += 0.5;
                });
                
                return Math.min(score / searchWords.length, 1);
            }

            function highlightSearchTerms(card, searchWords) {
                // Remove existing highlights
                card.querySelectorAll('.search-highlight').forEach(highlight => {
                    const parent = highlight.parentNode;
                    parent.replaceChild(document.createTextNode(highlight.textContent), highlight);
                    parent.normalize();
                });
                
                // Add new highlights
                searchWords.forEach(word => {
                    const walker = document.createTreeWalker(
                        card,
                        NodeFilter.SHOW_TEXT,
                        null,
                        false
                    );
                    
                    const textNodes = [];
                    let node;
                    
                    while (node = walker.nextNode()) {
                        if (node.nodeValue.toLowerCase().includes(word)) {
                            textNodes.push(node);
                        }
                    }
                    
                    textNodes.forEach(textNode => {
                        const regex = new RegExp(`(${word})`, 'gi');
                        const content = textNode.nodeValue;
                        
                        if (regex.test(content)) {
                            const span = document.createElement('span');
                            span.innerHTML = content.replace(regex, '<span class="search-highlight">$1</span>');
                            textNode.parentNode.replaceChild(span, textNode);
                        }
                    });
                });
            }

                const transferData = [

                    {
                        player: 'Jorrel Hato',
                        from: 'Ajax',
                        to: 'Chelsea',
                        fee: '‚Ç¨35M',
                        position: 'Centre-Back',
                        status: 'Negotiating',
                        probability: 68
                    }
                ];

                // Simulate real-time updates
                setInterval(() => {
                    const randomTransfer = transferData[Math.floor(Math.random() * transferData.length)];
                    const probabilityChange = (Math.random() - 0.5) * 10;
                    randomTransfer.probability = Math.max(0, Math.min(100, randomTransfer.probability + probabilityChange));
                    
                    updateTransferProbability(randomTransfer);
                    
                    if (Math.random() > 0.8) {
                        showLiveUpdate(randomTransfer);
                    }
                }, 15000);
            }

            function updateTransferProbability(transfer) {
                const cards = document.querySelectorAll('.transfer-card');
                cards.forEach(card => {
                    const playerName = card.querySelector('.player-name')?.textContent;
                    if (playerName && playerName.includes(transfer.player)) {
                        const probabilityElement = card.querySelector('.probability-bar');
                        if (probabilityElement) {
                            probabilityElement.style.width = `${transfer.probability}%`;
                            probabilityElement.style.transition = 'width 0.8s ease';
                        }
                    }
                });
            }

            function setupAdvancedFiltering() {
                const filters = {
                    club: document.getElementById('club-filter'),
                    position: document.getElementById('position-filter'),
                    feeRange: document.getElementById('fee-range')
                };

                // Enhanced fee range filtering
                if (filters.feeRange) {
                    filters.feeRange.addEventListener('change', function() {
                        const range = this.value;
                        filterByFeeRange(range);
                    });
                }

                // Enhanced position filtering
                if (filters.position) {
                    filters.position.addEventListener('change', function() {
                        const position = this.value;
                        filterByPosition(position);
                    });
                }
            }

            function filterByFeeRange(range) {
                const transferCards = document.querySelectorAll('.transfer-card');
                
                transferCards.forEach(card => {
                    const feeText = card.querySelector('.transfer-fee')?.textContent || '';
                    const feeValue = extractFeeValue(feeText);
                    
                    let show = true;
                    
                    switch(range) {
                        case '0-20':
                            show = feeValue >= 0 && feeValue <= 20;
                            break;
                        case '20-50':
                            show = feeValue > 20 && feeValue <= 50;
                            break;
                        case '50-100':
                            show = feeValue > 50 && feeValue <= 100;
                            break;
                        case '100+':
                            show = feeValue > 100;
                            break;
                        default:
                            show = true;
                    }
                    
                    if (feeText.toLowerCase().includes('loan') || feeText.toLowerCase().includes('free')) {
                        show = range === 'all' || range === '0-20';
                    }
                    
                    card.style.display = show ? 'block' : 'none';
                });
            }

            function extractFeeValue(feeText) {
                const match = feeText.match(/[¬£‚Ç¨]?(\d+(?:\.\d+)?)[mM]/);
                return match ? parseFloat(match[1]) : 0;
            }

            function filterByPosition(position) {
                const transferCards = document.querySelectorAll('.transfer-card');
                const positionMappings = {
                    'goalkeeper': ['goalkeeper', 'keeper', 'gk'],
                    'defender': ['defender', 'back', 'centre-back', 'full-back', 'wing-back'],
                    'midfielder': ['midfielder', 'midfield', 'central', 'attacking midfielder', 'defensive midfielder'],
                    'forward': ['forward', 'striker', 'winger', 'centre-forward', 'right winger', 'left winger']
                };
                
                transferCards.forEach(card => {
                    const positionText = card.querySelector('.player-position')?.textContent.toLowerCase() || '';
                    
                    let show = position === 'all';
                    
                    if (position !== 'all' && positionMappings[position]) {
                        show = positionMappings[position].some(pos => positionText.includes(pos));
                    }
                    
                    card.style.display = show ? 'block' : 'none';
                });
            }

            function initializeValueTracking() {
                // Add market value tracking for players
                const playerValues = {
                    'Viktor Gyokeres': { current: 55.3, change: +12.8, trend: 'up' },
                    'Bryan Mbeumo': { current: 71.0, change: +25.5, trend: 'up' },
                    'Benjamin Sesko': { current: 66.3, change: +8.2, trend: 'up' },
                    'Jack Grealish': { current: 45.0, change: -15.0, trend: 'down' },
                    'Milos Kerkez': { current: 40.0, change: +18.0, trend: 'up' }
                };

                // Update transfer cards with value information
                document.querySelectorAll('.transfer-card').forEach(card => {
                    const playerName = card.querySelector('.player-name')?.textContent;
                    if (playerName && playerValues[playerName]) {
                        const value = playerValues[playerName];
                        addValueIndicator(card, value);
                    }
                });
            }

            function addValueIndicator(card, value) {
                const playerInfo = card.querySelector('.player-info');
                if (playerInfo && !playerInfo.querySelector('.value-indicator')) {
                    const indicator = document.createElement('div');
                    indicator.className = 'value-indicator';
                    indicator.innerHTML = `
                        <span class="market-value">Market Value: ¬£${value.current}M</span>
                        <span class="value-change ${value.trend}">
                            ${value.change > 0 ? '+' : ''}${value.change}M
                            <i class="fas fa-arrow-${value.trend === 'up' ? 'up' : 'down'}"></i>
                        </span>
                    `;
                    playerInfo.appendChild(indicator);
                }
            }

            function setupInteractiveTimeline() {
                const timelineItems = document.querySelectorAll('.timeline-item');
                
                timelineItems.forEach(item => {
                    item.addEventListener('click', function() {
                        this.classList.toggle('expanded');
                        
                        // Add detailed information
                        if (this.classList.contains('expanded') && !this.querySelector('.timeline-details')) {
                            const details = document.createElement('div');
                            details.className = 'timeline-details';
                            details.innerHTML = `
                                <div class="detail-item">
                                    <i class="fas fa-calendar"></i>
                                    <span>Expected completion: Next 48 hours</span>
                                </div>
                                <div class="detail-item">
                                    <i class="fas fa-chart-line"></i>
                                    <span>Transfer probability: 85%</span>
                                </div>
                                <div class="detail-item">
                                    <i class="fas fa-newspaper"></i>
                                    <span>Last update: 2 hours ago</span>
                                </div>
                            `;
                            this.appendChild(details);
                        }
                    });
                });
            }

            function initializeLiveNotifications() {
                // Create notification container
                if (!document.querySelector('.notification-container')) {
                    const container = document.createElement('div');
                    container.className = 'notification-container';
                    document.body.appendChild(container);
                }
                
                // Show random live updates
                const liveUpdates = [
                    { type: 'transfer', message: 'üö® BREAKING: Medical scheduled for tomorrow', priority: 'high' },
                    { type: 'rumor', message: 'üìà UPDATE: Transfer probability increased', priority: 'medium' },
                    { type: 'confirmed', message: '‚úÖ CONFIRMED: Deal announcement imminent', priority: 'high' },
                    { type: 'bid', message: 'üí∞ NEW BID: Club increases offer by ¬£5M', priority: 'medium' }
                ];
                
                setInterval(() => {
                    if (Math.random() > 0.85) {
                        const update = liveUpdates[Math.floor(Math.random() * liveUpdates.length)];
                        showLiveNotification(update);
                    }
                }, 25000);
            }

            function showLiveNotification(update) {
                const container = document.querySelector('.notification-container');
                if (!container) return;
                
                const notification = document.createElement('div');
                notification.className = `live-notification ${update.priority}`;
                notification.innerHTML = `
                    <div class="notification-content">
                        <span class="notification-message">${update.message}</span>
                        <button class="notification-close">×</button>
                    </div>
                `;
                
                container.appendChild(notification);
                
                // Auto remove after 5 seconds
                setTimeout(() => {
                    notification.classList.add('fade-out');
                    setTimeout(() => notification.remove(), 300);
                }, 5000);
                
                // Manual close
                notification.querySelector('.notification-close').addEventListener('click', () => {
                    notification.classList.add('fade-out');
                    setTimeout(() => notification.remove(), 300);
                });
            }

            function showLiveUpdate(transfer) {
                const message = `üìä ${transfer.player}: Transfer probability updated to ${Math.round(transfer.probability)}%`;
                showLiveNotification({ type: 'update', message, priority: 'low' });
            }

            function updateSearchResults(visibleCount, searchTerm) {
                const container = document.querySelector('.transfers-grid')?.parentElement;
                if (!container) return;
                
                let resultsIndicator = container.querySelector('.search-results-indicator');
                
                if (searchTerm.length > 0) {
                    if (!resultsIndicator) {
                        resultsIndicator = document.createElement('div');
                        resultsIndicator.className = 'search-results-indicator';
                        container.insertBefore(resultsIndicator, container.querySelector('.transfers-grid'));
                    }
                    
                    resultsIndicator.innerHTML = `
                        <div class="results-info">
                            <i class="fas fa-search"></i>
                            <span>${visibleCount} result${visibleCount !== 1 ? 's' : ''} for "${searchTerm}"</span>
                            ${visibleCount === 0 ? '<button class="clear-search" onclick="clearSearch()">Clear search</button>' : ''}
                        </div>
                    `;
                } else if (resultsIndicator) {
                    resultsIndicator.remove();
                }
            }

            function clearSearch() {
                const searchInput = document.getElementById('transfer-search');
                if (searchInput) {
                    searchInput.value = '';
                    searchInput.dispatchEvent(new Event('input'));
                }
            }

            // Initialize enhanced features
            setTimeout(initializeEnhancedFeatures, 1000);

        });

    </script>
</body>
</html>

Fantasy Premier League Tips 2025/26: Unlock the Best FPL Tools, Strategies, & Player Picks on EPLNewsHub for Ultimate Success

By EPL News Hub | August 12, 2025

Are you on the hunt for the best Fantasy Premier League tips 2025/26 to crush your rivals and claim that top spot in your mini-league? As the Premier League 2025/26 season heats up, millions of FPL managers are scrambling for top FPL tools, advanced FPL strategies, FPL AI assistants, and expert FPL transfer tips that provide a real competitive edge. content.text:
Perfect! I've successfully transformed the AI Assistant into a **persistent sidebar chat interface**. Here's what's new:

## üéØ Key Changes:

### **Sidebar Design:**
- **Fixed position** on the right side of the screen
- **Vertical toggle button** that's always visible on the right edge
- **Slides in/out** smoothly from the right side
- **Full-height chat interface** from top to bottom of the screen

### **Chat Features:**
- **All chat functionality** contained within the sidebar
- **Quick action buttons** at the top for common questions
- **Message history** persists across sessions
- **Typing indicator** for realistic chat experience
- **Scrollable message area** with custom scrollbar

### **User Experience:**
- **Remembers state** - stays open/closed based on user preference
- **ESC key** to quickly close the sidebar
- **Auto-adjusts page content** - pushes main content left when open (desktop only)
- **Mobile responsive** - full-screen on mobile devices
- **Smooth animations** for all interactions

### **Visual Design:**
- **Gradient purple header** matching your brand
- **Clean white chat area** for readability
- **Rounded message bubbles** with subtle shadows
- **Professional minimal design** that doesn't distract from main content

The AI Assistant is now a sleek sidebar that users can keep open while browsing your site, making it easy to get FPL advice without interrupting their experience!

content.text:
Perfect! I've successfully updated the AI Assistant sidebar to work **exactly** like the FPL AI Assistant page. Here's what's now included:

## ‚úÖ Complete Feature Parity:

### **Knowledge Base:**
- Real FPL player data (Salah, Haaland, Palmer, etc.)
- Actual stats: points, goals, assists, xG, xA, ownership
- Team fixtures and difficulty ratings
- Strategic insights for chips and wildcards

### **Advanced Functionality:**
- **Dynamic Captain Scoring Algorithm** - calculates scores based on form, PPG, penalties, fixtures
- **Smart Transfer Analysis** - with confidence levels and VAPM calculations
- **Value Analysis** - identifies best budget picks using Value Added Per Million
- **Fixture Difficulty Analysis** - shows best fixture runs for teams
- **Differential Picks** - finds low-ownership gems
- **Chip Strategy Guidance** - optimal timing for wildcards, bench boost, triple captain
- **Player-Specific Analysis** - detailed stats for any mentioned player

### **AI Features:**
- Conversation memory (remembers last 10 interactions)
- Context tracking for follow-up questions
- Dynamic personality responses
- Confidence scoring on recommendations
- Markdown formatting for better readability
- Intelligent response routing based on query type

### **User Management:**
- 5 free messages per day for free users
- Unlimited messages for premium members
- Message counter with visual indicators
- Persistent message history across sessions
- Upgrade prompts when limit reached
- User profile tracking

### **UI/UX Improvements:**
- Professional sidebar chat interface
- Quick action buttons for common queries
- Typing indicator for realistic feel
- Auto-resize input field
- Responsive mobile design
- ESC key to close
- Remembers open/closed state

The sidebar AI Assistant now provides the **exact same intelligent FPL advice** as the dedicated AI Assistant page, with all the real data, advanced metrics, and strategic insights!
